A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed the fact that I did not see a few of the story choices beforehand. I was never quite sure what was going to happen next. The worst part of the movie is the subplot with Finn and the new character Rose\, it added little to the story and felt like a CG filled mess. There are some logical inconsistencies as well\, but that is a common feature of most movies now and days.
